author: Customer ~ Sexy JEG! @jagism
title: Customer ~ Sexy JEG! @jagism
text: It was a quick interaction I had no problems and the bundle was on sale. (I bought the Shadow of Mordor GOTY Edition for $7.39CAD :D) I haven't played the game yet but my Steam accepted the code given so I think the game will be fine.
